meanings.definition: Resembling or characteristic of a spider.
meanings.sent1: The spiderish web glistened in the sunlight.
meanings.sent2: Her spiderish movements were quick and precise.
meanings.sent3: The spiderish way he climbed the rope made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her fingers moved in a spiderish manner across the keyboard.
meanings.sent5: The room was filled with a spiderish silence, making everyone uneasy.

meanings.definition: Having qualities or characteristics similar to those of a spider.
meanings.sent1: The spiderish legs of the table made it look unique.
meanings.sent2: His spiderish instincts helped him sense danger.
meanings.sent3: The spiderish way she organized her books was quite impressive.
meanings.sent4: His mind worked in a spiderish pattern, connecting ideas effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: The spiderish design of the building gave it a mysterious vibe.
